item.description: On Monday, May 23, starting at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “Spatio-Temporal Disproofs of God,” a talk by Michael Martin, Prof. Emeritus of Philosophy (Boston University), based in part on Nicholas Everitt, The Nonexistence of God (2004), Ch. 14 “Eternity and Omnipresence.” Location: Rm. 442 of the BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to the public. More info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.why: ... Michael Martin's work in the domain of disproof atheism have helped make Atheism an intellectually robust and honest position.
item.name: Disproof Atheism Society presents Spatio-Temporal Disproofs of God
